data.text: @YouGov Aside from the odd handful of people wearing masks, life where I live has been normal for months. What's happening elsewhere that qualifies as abnormal?

@YouGov Might be gone? They are definitely not gone:
https://t.co/eSCyYEtzor

@YouGov How can it be when the unvaccinated are discriminated against and can't fly to many places, can't work in all places, can't visit some venues and we hear about digital/vaccine passports?
Not to mention testing requirements still in place
